  • Classes in com.qtfx.lib.task used by com.qtfx.lib.gui 
    Class and Description
    JoinPool
    An extension of the ForkJoinPool with helpers to work with tasks.
    Task
    An observable recursive action that is not forced to be observed from the FX application thread.
  • Classes in com.qtfx.lib.task used by com.qtfx.lib.task 
    Class and Description
    JoinPool
    An extension of the ForkJoinPool with helpers to work with tasks.
    State
    Enumerates the task possible states.
    Task
    An observable recursive action that is not forced to be observed from the FX application thread.
    Task.Message
    A small class to manage published strings.
    Task.Progress
    A small class to manage the published progress.
    TaskAdapter
    A task adapter to override only required methods.
    TaskPool
    A task that executes other tasks in a concurrent pool.
    TaskRun
    A task that runs in a task pool.
